mapper.select:
SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.farm.mapper.FarmLandGrantsInfoMapper.selectfarmLandGrantsInfo */ CM.FRMER_SN , CM.PNU_CODE , CM.BSNS_BGNDE , CM.BSNS_ENDDE , CM.BSNS_CODE , CM.BSNS_NM , CM.STTUS , CM.APPLCNT_NM , CM.LDGRFL , CM.FRLND_ADRES , CM.LEGALDONG_CODE , CM.MNNM , CM.SLNO , CM.REQST_AR , CM.DEL_YN , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID FROM TB_FRLN_RCFV_HSTRY CM WHERE 1=1
AND CM.FRMER_SN LIKE #{frmerSn} || '%'
AND CM.BZOB_RGNO LIKE '%' || #{bzobRgno} || '%'
ORDER BY CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT DESC

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.farm.mapper.FarmLandGrantsInfoMapper.selectfarmLandGrantsInfoList */ CM.FRMER_SN , CM.PNU_CODE , CM.BSNS_BGNDE , CM.BSNS_ENDDE , CM.BSNS_CODE , CM.BSNS_NM , CM.STTUS , CM.APPLCNT_NM , CM.LDGRFL , CM.FRLND_ADRES , CM.LEGALDONG_CODE , CM.MNNM , CM.SLNO , CM.REQST_AR , CM.DEL_YN , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID FROM TB_FRLN_RCFV_HSTRY CM WHERE 1=1
AND CM.FRMER_SN LIKE #{frmerSn} || '%'
AND CM.BZOB_RGNO LIKE '%' || #{bzobRgno} || '%'
ORDER BY CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT DESC
